task.name: Select Entity
task.objective: Present standardized entity selection UI, capture user choice, and return entity context variables
task.description: This task standardizes how users select an entity (Constitution, Module, Category, etc.) across all workflows. It reads the manifest, displays a structured list, accepts user input (number or name), and returns the fully resolved entity context.

returns.variable: One of: constitution, infrastructure_module, strategic_container, coordination_unit, business_module
Resolved absolute path to the entity's directory or file

step.title: Read Manifest
step.action: Parse the file to identify all active and planned entities organized by type: 1. Constitution (docs/platform/*.md) 2. Infrastructure Modules (docs/platform/{module}/) 3. Strategic Containers (docs/{category}/) 4. Coordination Units (docs/{category}/{subcategory}/) 5. Business Modules (docs/{category}/{subcategory}/{module}/)
